title: Why large factories developed in England

content.prompt: The incentive for the development of large factories associated with England's early Industrial Revolution was primarily connected with which of the following?

choices.label: The discovery of new methods of iron production
The increasing demand for weaponry due to imperial warfare
The mechanization of the spinning process in the textile industry

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
